title: The two key questions posed by McLaren's Miami GP dominance
summary: McLaren crushed the opposition in the Miami Grand Prix, with Piastri taking his third straight win in a race that looked like Norris's to lose.Mark Hughesanswers the main questions from the sixth round of the 2025 season

qa_pairs.question: Who secured their third consecutive win at the 2025 Miami Grand Prix?
Which team dominated the Miami Grand Prix in 2025?
What position was Lando Norris expected to finish in during the Miami GP?
